Chairman of Investment Committee of Charles
Stanley, 55 Bishopsgate, London EC2N 3AS; an
investment advisory company. My duties are to
write a twice weekly market review and investment
report, to chair the investment committee and to
make oral and written presentations. From November
2017 until further notice, I receive £45,900 a
quarter for an expected commitment of 75 hours.
(Updated 16 November 2013, 31 July 2015, 15
November 2016, 14 June 2017 and 30 October 2017)
